subject: Math
goals: Understand the fundamental concepts of points, lines, and planes, and learn about angles and their measurements.
milestones: By the end of the week, be able to define and differentiate between points, lines, and planes, and accurately measure and classify angles.

timetable.session: 2 sessions, 1 hour each on Wednesday and Saturday

learning_tasks.task: Review definitions and properties of points, lines, and planes.
Study different types of angles and learn to measure them.

practice_tasks.task: Complete a worksheet on identifying and naming points, lines, and planes.
Solve practice problems on measuring angles and identifying their types.

resources: Chapter 1 of the geometry textbook, Khan Academy's Geometry basics: https://www.khanacademy.org/math/geometry/hs-geo-foundations
